scripts.title: Qualification Connect Script
scripts.script_body:
**Opening**
Hi {{contact.first_name}}, this is {{user.first_name}} with Nimbus Analytics.

**Value Statement**
We help operations leaders reduce manual reporting by 40% through real-time dashboards.

**Discovery Questions**
1. How are you currently consolidating performance metrics?
2. What triggers your team to investigate dips in output?

**Next Step**
If it makes sense, I can line up a discovery with one of our solution architects. Does Tuesday morning work?
scripts.compliance_notes: Mention that all calls are recorded for quality and training purposes.

scripts.title: Negotiation Value Reinforcement
scripts.script_body:
**Reframe**
{{contact.first_name}}, I wanted to revisit the financial outcomes we modeled last week.

**Value Proof**
- ${{deal.pipeline_savings}} annual reduction in manual reconciliation hours.
- ${{deal.error_cost_avoidance}} saved by alert-driven compliance workflows.

**Ask**
Are there any procurement blockers we can resolve before your fiscal close on {{deal.fiscal_close_date}}?
scripts.compliance_notes: Confirm NDA coverage before sharing detailed pricing.
